typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Epoch as integer,
		Weight as double
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> WeightLogCSV
WeightLogCSV derive(Date = trim(left(toString(toTimestamp(seconds(Epoch))),10)),
		Time = trim(right(toString(toTimestamp(seconds(Epoch))),8))) ~> DateTimeColumn
DateTimeColumn keyGenerate(output(EventID as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> GenerateSurrogateKey
GenerateSurrogateKey filter(0.8<Weight
&&Weight<10) ~> Filter1
Filter1 select(mapColumn(
		Epoch,
		Weight,
		Date,
		Time,
		EventID
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:[("Done")],
	mapColumn(
		EventID,
		Epoch,
		EventTime = Time,
		EventDate = Date,
		PenguinWeight = Weight
	),
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Sink
